UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthetic Peptide Libraries Designed From a Minimal Alpha-Helical Domain of AS-48-Bacteriocin Homologs Exhibit Potent Antibacterial Activity.
Literature.Author: Ross JN, Fields FR, Kalwajtys VR, Gonzalez AJ, O'Connor S, Zhang A, Moran TE, Hammers DE, Carothers KE, Lee SW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MBC=2µM),Streptococcus pyogenes M1T1 5448(MIC=16µM),Streptococcus pyogenes M1T1 5448(MBC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MBC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=16µM)
